mapper.select: select user_point from tbl_user where user_email = #{user_email}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_point(point_num, user_email, point_code, point_score, room_num) values(seq_point_num.nextval, #{user_email}, #{point_code}, #{point_score}, #{room_num})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_reservation where user_email = #{user_email} order by reserv_num desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reservation(reserv_num, room_num, user_email, room_reserv_start_date, room_reserv_end_date, reserv_price, reserv_state) values(seq_reserv_num.nextval, #{room_num}, #{user_email}, #{check_in}, #{check_out}, #{room_price_v}, #{reserv_state})
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_room r where r.room_num = #{room_num} and r.room_num not in( select v.room_num from tbl_reservation v where (room_reserv_start_date > #{room_reserv_start_date} and room_reserv_end_date <= #{room_reserv_end_date}) or (room_reserv_start_date > #{room_reserv_start_date} and room_reserv_start_date <= #{room_reserv_end_date}) or (room_reserv_end_date > #{room_reserv_start_date} and room_reserv_end_date <= #{room_reserv_end_date}) )

select m.*, r.user_email, r.room_reserv_start_date, r.room_reserv_end_date, r.reserv_price from tbl_room m, (select room_num, user_email, room_reserv_start_date, room_reserv_end_date, reserv_price from tbl_reservation where reserv_num = #{reserv_num}) r where m.room_num = r.room_num
